creator: Zoho Corporation
descriptionHtml:
Site24x7 Android App is made for website, server and APM Application monitoring on-the-go. The app provides real-time alerts on your Android device when a performance problem occur on your technology stack.

With Site24x7 Android app you can: monitor availability and performance of websites, servers, web applications, cloud, VMs, APM and network even while on the move. You can receive instant alerts via push notifications. You can also view Root Cause Analysis (RCA) of a downtime, track SLAs and view reports of monitors.

Site24x7 Android app is a free supplement to the Site24x7 monitoring service. To use the app, you need a Site24x7 account or you can signup for a risk-free 30-day trial from the app.

Site24x7 Android app currently entails you the following:

* Check website availability instantly within the app.
* View current status (up or down) of all your monitors.
* Get instant alerts directly to your Android device via push notifications
* Check process, services & network statistics of each server monitor.
* Start or stop services of a service monitor.
* Quickly view the Root Cause Analysis (RCA) report when a website is down.
* Mark an identified downtime as maintenance.
* View availability by configured locations.
* Track configured SLA.
* View outage reports by time period break down.
* Graphical view for monitor’s response time
* With APM, you can now monitor your app performance on the go and resolve issues as and when they occur.

About Site24x7:

Site24x7 is an all-in-one infrastructure monitoring service that helps DevOps and IT operations teams to gain deep visibility into production full-stack performance of the websites, servers, online applications, mobile apps, VMs, Cloud, network and other Internet-facing services.

Site24x7’s in-depth monitoring capabilities enable DevOps teams to monitor and troubleshoot applications, servers and network infrastructure, including private and public clouds. End-user experience monitoring happens from more than 50+ locations across the world and various wireless carriers.

Site24x7 is a service by Zoho Corp. (since 1996), the company behind the products at Zoho.com and IT Management products at ManageEngine.com.

Site24x7 offers the following all-in-one performance monitoring features for your technology stacks:

WEBSITE MONITORING

* Website Performance Monitoring
* Website Availability Monitoring
* Monitor Web Page Defacement
* Website Application Monitoring
* Real Browser Monitoring (RBM)
* Real User Monitoring (RUM)
* Synthetic Transaction Monitoring
* Web Page Analyser
* Mail Server Monitoring
* POP3/SMTP/IMAP Monitoring
* DNS Monitoring
* SSL Certificate Monitoring
* FTP Monitoring
* Monitor Internal Network
* Public Status Pages
* REST API Monitoring
* SOAP Monitoring

SERVER MONITORING

* Server Monitoring
* Windows Monitoring
* Linux Monitoring
* IIS Monitoring
* SQL Monitoring
* SharePoint Server Monitoring
* MS Exchange Server Monitoring
* Linux Syslog Monitoring
* File and Directory Monitoring
* Log File Monitoring
* Docker Monitoring
* VMware Monitoring
* Amazon Cloud Monitoring
* Amazon EC2 Monitoring
* Amazon RDS Monitoring

APPLICATION PERFORMANCE MONITORING

* Java Performance Monitoring
* .NET Performance Monitoring
* Ruby Performance Monitoring
* Azure Application Monitoring
* AWS Application Monitoring
* Real User Monitoring (RUM)
* Mobile Application Performance Monitoring

NETWORK MONITORING

* Switch Monitoring
* Router Performance Monitoring

Take a look at our website - https://www.site24x7.com/

Need help? Please contact support@site24x7.com or raise a ticket at https://www.site24x7.com/contact-support.html

descriptionHtml:
Site24x7 Android App

Site24x7 android app is a free supplement from Site24x7, an all-in-one monitoring tool for DevOps and IT Operations from the cloud. Monitor the performance of websites, servers, network, cloud resources, and APM application on-the-go.

To use the app, all you need is a Site24x7 account to login! If you do not have one, sign-up for a risk-free 30-day trial from the app, add website monitors, and explore the app friendly designs & features.

The app sends instant alerts through push notifications to your android device when an outage occurs. The alerts could be on the Down, Critical, or Trouble status (customise each alert status under settings) of your Site24x7 monitoring resource which will need immediate attention.The app gives a detailed view of the alerts in the Alarms view and allows you to add comments to assist the technicians resolve the issue efficiently.
Send feedback by simply shaking the device.

Admin users can assign technicians directly and look into the issue instantly.
Site24x7 android app aids technicians by providing them the availability and performance reports of websites, infrastructure, Cloud (AWS/Azure), Application Insight, Virtualization, and Network. Get an extensive Root Cause Analysis (RCA), Downtime report or SLA reports for your monitoring resources to drill deep into the issues and find a solution.

Use Site24x7 android app to:

Monitor your app performance on the go and resolve issues in time with APM.
Check process, services, and network statistics of each server monitor.
Start adding website monitors directly from the app.
Get to know which monitors are up, down, in trouble or under maintenance with the monitor status widget.
Start or stop services of a server monitor.
Schedule specific identified downtime as maintenance.
Track configured SLA.
Add monitors and perform admin actions from Admin tab.
View the Root Cause Analysis (RCA) report when a website is down.
View the current status (up or down) of all your monitors.
View outage reports by time period break down.
View availability based on configured locations.
Obtain negative trends in your IT infrastructure with Anomaly Dashboard.
Get a glance of the MSP or BU user dashboard to gain the monitor availability status of all customers or units respectively.

About Site24x7

Site24x7 is an all-in-one infrastructure monitoring solution that aids DevOps and IT operations team to gain deep visibility into production full-stack performance of the websites, servers, online applications, mobile apps, VMs, Cloud, network and other Internet-facing services.

The Site24x7 mobile app renders in-depth monitoring capabilities for DevOps teams to monitor and troubleshoot applications, servers and network infrastructure, including private and public clouds. End-user experience monitoring is provided from more than 110+ locations across the world and various wireless carriers.

Site24x7 offers the following all-in-one performance monitoring features for your technology stacks:

Monitor Website Performance
Server Monitoring
Synthetic Web Transaction Monitoring
Application Performance Monitoring
Network Monitoring
Public and Private Cloud Monitoring
Real User Monitoring | RUM
Cloud Cost Management
Public Status Pages
RMM for MSPs and CSPs
Log Management from the Cloud


Take a look at our website -https://www.site24x7.com/


Need help? Please contact support@site24x7.com (or)
raise a ticket at https://www.site24x7.com/contact-support.html

Copyright © 2020 Zoho Corporation Pvt. Ltd.

To use the app, all you need is a Site24x7 account to login! If you do not have one, sign-up for a risk-free 30-day trial from the app, add website monitors, and explore the app friendly designs & features.

The app sends instant alerts through push notifications to your android device when an outage occurs. The alerts could be on the Down, Critical, or Trouble status (customise each alert status under settings) of your Site24x7 monitoring resource which will need immediate attention.The app gives a detailed view of the alerts in the Alarms view and allows you to add comments to assist the technicians resolve the issue efficiently.
Send feedback by simply shaking the device.

Admin users can assign technicians directly and look into the issue instantly.
Site24x7 android app aids technicians by providing them the availability and performance reports of websites, infrastructure, Cloud (AWS/Azure), Application Insight, Virtualization, and Network. Get an extensive Root Cause Analysis (RCA), Downtime report or SLA reports for your monitoring resources to drill deep into the issues and find a solution.

Use Site24x7 android app to:

Monitor your app performance on the go and resolve issues in time with APM.
Check process, services, and network statistics of each server monitor.
Start adding website monitors directly from the app.
Get to know which monitors are up, down, in trouble or under maintenance with the monitor status widget.
Start or stop services of a server monitor.
Schedule specific identified downtime as maintenance.
Track configured SLA.
Add monitors and perform admin actions from Admin tab.
View the Root Cause Analysis (RCA) report when a website is down.
View the current status (up or down) of all your monitors.
View outage reports by time period break down.
View availability based on configured locations.
Obtain negative trends in your IT infrastructure with Anomaly Dashboard.
Get a glance of the MSP or BU user dashboard to gain the monitor availability status of all customers or units respectively.

Site24x7 is an all-in-one infrastructure monitoring solution that aids DevOps and IT operations team to gain deep visibility into production full-stack performance of the websites, servers, online applications, mobile apps, VMs, Cloud, network and other Internet-facing services.

The Site24x7 mobile app renders in-depth monitoring capabilities for DevOps teams to monitor and troubleshoot applications, servers and network infrastructure, including private and public clouds. End-user experience monitoring is provided from more than 110+ locations across the world and various wireless carriers.

Site24x7 offers the following all-in-one performance monitoring features for your technology stacks:

Monitor Website Performance

Network Monitoring

descriptionHtml:
About Site24x7 Android App

The Site24x7 Android app is engineered to enable DevOps and IT teams to troubleshoot application performance and investigate incidents in websites, servers, networks, and cloud resources in real time.
Track real-time metrics on-the-go for over 500 technologies with the help of visual charts and dashboards.

How Site24x7 Android app can help:

Based on your user profile, you can receive instant notifications, easily assign engineers to resolve issues, add comments, analyze the root cause of incidents, track KPIs of monitored resources, mark maintenance for known alerts, and authenticate remedial actions-- all from the mobile app.
The Site24x7 Android App provides availability and performance reports for all monitored resources in addition to RCA, SLA, and downtime reports.

Use Site24x7 Android app to:
* Receive instant notifications when monitored resources become unavailable or when there is a performance degradation
* Monitor your server performance with over 80 metrics
* Start monitoring domains (websites) right from the app with simple add steps.
* Get a complete visual snapshot of all monitors with monitor status widgets.
* Remediate incidents on the go with IT Automation.
* Troubleshoot performance of applications with a customized mobile experience for APM Insight
* Achieve better SLA through schedule maintenance for known downtime.
* Track configured SLA.
* Add monitors and perform admin actions from Admin tab.
* View the Root Cause Analysis (RCA) report when a website is down.
* View the status (up or down) of all your monitors.
* View outage reports by time period break down.
* View availability based on configured locations.
* Spot anomalies in your IT infrastructure performance with the Anomaly Dashboard.
* Get a glance of the MSP or BU user dashboard to gain the monitor availability status
of all customers or units respectively

About Site24x7

Site24x7 offers AI-powered full stack monitoring for DevOps and IT operations with telemetry data collected from servers, containers, networks, cloud, database, applications and provide AI-powered full stack observability. Additionally, Site24x7 can track end user experience via synthetic and real user monitoring capabilities. DevOps & IT teams can use these capabilities to troubleshoot and resolve application downtime and performance issues, infrastructure issues and better manage the digital user experience.
Site24x7 offers the following all-in-one performance monitoring features for your technology stacks:

* Website Monitoring
* Server Monitoring
* Application Performance Monitoring
* Network Monitoring
* Azure and GCP Monitoring
* Hybrid, private, and public cloud monitoring
* Container monitoring

For any assistance, please contact support@site24x7.com.

descriptionHtml:
About the Site24x7 Android app

ManageEngine Site24x7 is an AI-powered observability platform for DevOps and IT operations. The cloud-based platform’s broad capabilities help troubleshoot application performance and investigate incidents related to websites, servers, networks, and cloud resources in real time. Users can track real-time metrics for over 600 technologies using visual charts and dashboards while on the go, all from a single console.

How the Site24x7 Android app can help

Based on your user profile, you can receive instant notifications, add comments, analyze the root causes of incidents, track the KPIs of monitored resources, mark known alerts as maintenance, and authenticate remedial actions—all through the mobile app. The Site24x7 Android app provides availability and performance reports for all monitored resources, along with root cause analysis (RCA), service level agreement (SLA), and downtime reports.

Get outage histories and performance reports for your monitors. Manage multiple accounts across domains and track your system health using widgets like Alarms and Status. Alarm shortcuts help you access the alarm directly from the screen. Quickly assign technicians for faster resolution and create shortcuts to monitor multiple alarms with ease.

The app supports both light and dark themes for a personalized experience.

Use the Site24x7 Android app to:
Troubleshoot issues instantly
* Get instant notifications for performance issues and resolve them with IT automation. Customize status notifications and instantly test alerts using the Test Alert feature.
* View monitor statuses (Up, Down, Trouble, or Critical) and RCA reports for downtime.
* Get outage and performance reports for monitors with detailed breakdowns.
* Detect anomalies in IT performance with the Anomaly dashboard.
* Access the MSP and Business Unit dashboards for customer-specific availability insights.
* Manage SLAs efficiently with scheduled maintenance and SLA tracking.
* Add monitors and perform administrative actions from the Admin tab.
* Get a visual overview of all monitors with status widgets that allow quick access to alarms, technician assignments, and detailed monitor information, supporting 1x1 widgets, alarm features, and statistics-based widgets.

Monitor & manage with ease
* Log in with multiple accounts to manage all data centers (DCs) effortlessly.
* Monitor domains and track your server performance using over 80 metrics.
* Set time zones for seamless monitoring and location-based availability views.
* Collaborate on updates to monitor statuses with incident chat
* Data center-based availability tracking for individual accounts.

Personalize your experience
* Enjoy a fresh interface with light and dark themes.

About Site24x7

Site24x7 provides AI-powered full-stack monitoring specifically designed for DevOps and IT operations. It collects telemetry data from various sources, including servers, containers, networks, cloud environments, databases, and applications, to offer comprehensive observability. Additionally, Site24x7 tracks end-user experiences through both synthetic and real user monitoring capabilities. These features enable DevOps and IT teams to troubleshoot and resolve application downtime, performance issues, and infrastructure challenges, ultimately helping them manage the digital user experience more effectively.
Site24x7 offers a wide range of all-in-one performance monitoring features for your technology stacks, including:
* Website monitoring
* Server monitoring
* Application performance monitoring
* Network monitoring
* Azure and GCP monitoring
* Hybrid, private, and public cloud monitoring
* Container monitoring

For any help, please get in touch with support@site24x7.com
